name: Sky Survival (mylstudio)
description:
Survive in space with your friends in Sky Survival.
Sky Survival is a single-player and multiplayer game where the goal is to survive as long as possible in space. 
put your best score in the comments !

There are many dangers: you must avoid asteroids and destroy enemy ships while collecting stars and items.

Keys in single player mode: 
arrows to move, space bar to shoot.

Keys in Duo mode: 
arrows to move and space bar to shoot for PLAYER 1.
Z, Q, S, D to move and A to shoot for PLAYER 2.
